        Parameters:
        item - Item to modify
        key - Key, will be lowercased and must match [a-z0-9/._-]
        value - Value to be stored as an NBTString

      • exists

        public static boolean exists(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack is)
        Convenience method for checking if an ItemStack is non-null and non-AIR
        Parameters:
        is - ItemStack to check
        Returns:
        is != null && is.getType() != Material.AIR;
